features: ☆Premium Quality: This table cloth is made of high-quality polyester fabric which make the tablecloth soft for cozy touch. The fabric of our durable and delicate tablecloth is more wrinkle free and shrink-proof than other materials, and fits all occasions.

☆Function: This table cloth is waterproof. When the drink, oil or other liquid dripping onto the tablecluth, they will bead up and not leak through the tablecloth. And then you can clean easily it by using a tissue or sponge to absorb the liquid.

☆Protect Tabletop: Set the tablecloth on your table that it can avoid from splashes and food residues that can keep the tabletop clean and reduce cleaning work after meals to make your life easier. It can also cover the original damaged traces on the desktop and protect it from more scratches.

☆Size Information: This tablecloth measures 54 x 108 inch (137x204cm). We have 7 sizes for you to choose. Please measure your table size before purchase and calculate the proper size for your square/rectangular table.

☆Easy to Care: Liquids can be wiped clean quickly. For a deeper clean, machine wash in cold water and tumble dry. Hand wash best, dryer drying or lay flat to dry. Require little or no ironing and do not bleach.
description: Spread our durable tablecloths with waterproof design, your dining table will not easily get dirty.
